name: .NKSN File Extension
summary: Learn about .NKSN files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open NKSN files with Kontakt Player in Windows and macOS. To open an NKSN file with Kontakt Player:
Open the Snapshot view by clicking the Snapshot View (camera icon).
Select the arrow icon next to the Snapshot name field.
Select the NKSN snapshot you want to open.
You can also drag and drop an NKSN file onto an active Instrument in the Rack in Kontakt Player to open it.
